title: How to Change Snapchat Notification Sound on Android & iPhone

steps.title: Tap the Chat icon.
steps.content: Tap the Chat icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera. You'll see a list of all your recently messaged friends. You must be a Snapchat+ subscriber to apply exclusive notification sounds to specific friends or groups. If you do not have Snapchat+, you won't be able to change the notification sounds using the app. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap and hold on a friend's name or group.
steps.content: Tap and hold on a friend's name or group. A pop-up menu will open. [2] X Research source You can also reach this menu by tapping a friend's profile icon and then tapping the three dots icon in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Chat settings.
steps.content: Tap Chat settings . This will be underneath Manage Friendship . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Notification Sounds.
steps.content: Tap Notification Sounds . If you haven't changed it before, it will be set to Default Sound . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Select the new notification sound.
steps.content: Select the new notification sound. You can choose Alien Amulet, Bottle Pop, Fairy Glass, Log Goblin, Melody Beach, or Mini Drop.

steps.title: Tap Set Notification Sound.
steps.content: Tap Set Notification Sound . This will save your settings. [5] X Research source Your new notification sound will play when you receive a Snap, Chat, or typing notification from your friend or group.

steps.title: Open the Settings app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Settings app on your iPhone or iPad. This is the grey cog icon. Be sure to update your iPhone . [6] X Research source Applying notification tones to specific apps requires iOS 18 or newer.

steps.title: Tap Notifications.
steps.content: Tap Notifications . You'll see your notification settings for all the apps on your device. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Snapchat.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Snapchat . This will be below Notification Style .

steps.title: Toggle on "Allow Notifications".
steps.content: Toggle on "Allow Notifications". If this is already enabled, skip this step.

steps.title: Tap Sounds.
steps.content: Tap Sounds . This is in the Alerts section, under Banner Style .

steps.title: Select a new sound.
steps.content: Select a new sound. If you don't like any of the tones, you can tap Tone Store to purchase and download new tones.

steps.title: Tap < Back.
steps.content: Tap < Back . This will save your tone settings. When you receive Snapchat notifications on your iOS device, you will hear this new tone as long as your device isn't on silent mode . You may need to restart the Snapchat app for it to take effect.

steps.title: Open the Settings app on your Android device.
steps.content: Open the Settings app on your Android device. This is the grey gear icon. [8] X Research source Be sure to update your device . This method will change your Snapchat notification sounds through your device's settings without changing the sounds for other apps.

steps.title: Tap Apps & notifications.
steps.content: Tap Apps & notifications . On some devices, this may look like Apps & permissions .

steps.title: Tap Apps or App manager.
steps.content: Tap Apps or App manager . You'll see a list of your installed apps.

steps.title: Tap Snapchat.
steps.content: Tap Snapchat . You'll be able to see Snapchat's app information.

steps.title: Tap Notification, then Sound.
steps.content: Tap Notification , then Sound . A list of available sounds will appear. [9] X Research source On some devices, you may need to tap Quiet Notifications or Notification category to see the Sound settings.

steps.title: Select the sound you want and tap OK.
steps.content: Select the sound you want and tap OK . This will apply the ringtone to your Snapchat notifications. When you receive a Snapchat notification, you'll hear the new sound.

steps.title: Sign up for Snapchat+.
steps.content: Sign up for Snapchat+. If you're trying to customize the notification sounds directly on Snapchat, you must be a Snapchat+ subscriber. Currently, there's no way for basic users to change the sound within the app.

steps.title: Check your sound settings.
steps.content: Check your sound settings. If you applied a new sound using your device settings and aren't hearing it, make sure you have your volume on. Also, make sure you don't have any silencing modes enabled, such as Do Not Disturb or another Focus mode.
